com.epoch.chem
Class NewmanConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.chem.NewmanConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChemConstants, FormatConstants
public final class NewmanConverter
extends Object
implements ChemConstants

Converts a Newman projection to a 3D molecule.

Constructor.

debugPrint

private void debugPrint(Object... msg)

debugPrintMRV

private void debugPrintMRV(Object... msg)

convert

public Molecule convert()
                 throws MolFormatException
Converts a Newman projection to a 3D molecule.

Returns:
a molecule with the geometry of the Newman projection.
Throws:
MolFormatException

moveToCenter

public String moveToCenter()
                    throws MolExportException
Centers a Newman projection drawing.

Throws:
MolExportException

getNewmanLines

private void getNewmanLines()
                     throws MolFormatException
Gets the lines of a Newman projection. Groups them into two groups of three; the first group is in the back, the second group is in the front; this is a safe assumption as long as the drawing looks like a Newman projection, with three lines partially hidden behind a circle.

Throws:
MolFormatException

getNewmanCenters

private void getNewmanCenters()
Gets the centers of the lines of a Newman projection.

getLineEndPts

private DPoint3[][][] getLineEndPts()
Gets the endpoints of each line nearest the atoms.

Returns:
twelve endpoints in a 3D array: first dimension is LIG_END or CTR_END, second dimension is the trio, third dimension is the line number

getNewmanLigands

private void getNewmanLigands()
                       throws MolFormatException
Gets the six atoms that are supposed to be attached to the two central C atoms. We populate two arrays: one with atoms or shortcut groups placed by the user, the other with atoms only.

Throws:
MolFormatException

getNearestLines

private int[][] getNearestLines(DPoint3[][][] endLocs)
Gets which attachment point is closest to which line.

Parameters:
endLocs - the locations of the two endpoints of each line representing a bond
Returns:
2D array of ints: first dimension is the ligand number, second dimension is the trio and line number

indexOf

private int indexOf(MolAtom ligand)
Gets the 1-based index of a shortcut group or atom.

Parameters:
ligand - the atom
Returns:
1-based index

uniquelyCorrelated

private boolean uniquelyCorrelated(int[][] nearestLines)
Gets whether each line, given by two integers, is found only once in a list of six that correspond to the six attachment points.

Parameters:
nearestLines - list of lines that have the largest ligand-endpoint-origin angles with each ligand
Returns:
true if each line is found only once

addCentralCAtoms

private MolAtom[] addCentralCAtoms()
Adds two central C atoms to the molecule, offsetting them in the z direction, and adding a bond between them.

Returns:
the array of two central atoms

connectLigands

private MolBond[] connectLigands(int[][] nearestLines,
                                 MolAtom[] centralCAtoms)
Connects the attachment points of the Newman projection to the central C atoms.

Parameters:
nearestLines - which line each ligand is closest to
centralCAtoms - central C atoms of the Newman projection
Returns:
array of new bonds between attachment points and central atoms

moveLigands

private void moveLigands(int[][] nearestLines,
                         MolBond[] ligBonds)
Moves the attachment points in the z direction to make 109.5 degree bond angles.

Parameters:
nearestLines - which line each ligand is closest to
ligBonds - bonds from attachment points to two central C atoms

clearObjects

private void clearObjects()
Clears graphical objects from the drawing.
